effect.black_white: User copies the target’s species, weight, type, ability, calculated stats (except HP), and moves. Copied moves will all have 5 PP remaining. IVs are copied for the purposes of hidden power, but stats are not recalculated. choice band, choice scarf, and choice specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor forced by encore.
effect.black_2_white_2: User copies the target’s species, weight, type, ability, calculated stats (except HP), and moves. Copied moves will all have 5 PP remaining. IVs are copied for the purposes of hidden power, but stats are not recalculated. choice band, choice scarf, and choice specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor forced by encore.

short_effect.black_white: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.black_white: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.
